{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WPSM54G |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin=B000LSZ0Q0 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/21/2006 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=print server |fcc_id=Q87-WPSM54G |ic_id=3839A-WPSM54G |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R2886-G;R2886-G, 0652-C-LF, 8UA-D2JG2.1; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800CTTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIR-174G |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G PrintServer with Multifunctional Printer Support}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WPSM54G}} "WT00B", "1.6MM', a lead-free logo, and a date code of '''0607''' is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. ==Additional external links== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=343115 Thread on the '''DD-WRT''' Forums regarding the device] w/ high-res internal images
